casebody.data:
ZLOOP, INC.
v.
PARKER POE ADAMS & BERNSTEIN LLP, et al. 122PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2019 Gavin J. Reardon, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Amiel J. Rossabi, Attorney at Law, Bonnie Keith Green, Attorney at Law, for Zloop, INC. Robert W. Fuller, Attorney at Law, Stuart L. Pratt, Attorney at Law, Mark W. Merritt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Parker Poe Adams & Bernstein, LLP, et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of July 2019 by Plaintiff to Stay All Proceedings in the Present Matter: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of July 2019." Davis, J. recused
